r1.name: Ayurvedic Sleep Tonic
r1.ingredients: 1 Cup raw Almonds, Pink Salt, Ashwagandha powder
r1.recipe: Heat the Almond milk, add salt, add other ingredients and boil it
r1.description: Ayurvedic Sleep Tonic for good sleep

r2.name: Tulsi Tea
r2.ingredients: Tulsi Leaves, Ginger, Peppercorns, Black Salt, Lemon Juice
r2.recipe: Add tulsi leaves to 1.5 cups of water, Boil it for 10 mins, Add ginger, Add black salt and black salt, squeeze 0.5 lemon

r3.name: Mulethi Kadha
r3.ingredients: Mulethi powder, Cinnamon powder, Black pepper powder, Tulsi leaves, Honey
r3.recipe: Take 1/4 teaspoon mulethi powder, a pinch of cinnamon powder, black pepper powder and few tulsi leaves, 1 Cup of boiling water, Simmer for 5 minutes, add 1 teaspoon of honey

r4.name: Sleepy Tea
r4.ingredients: dried mint, dried lemon, dried passsionflower, dried california poppy, dried rose petals, fennel seeds
r4.recipe: Boil water, add dried mint, 1/4 Cup of lemon, 2 tablespoon of passionflower, 2 tablespoon of california poppy, 2 tablespoon of rose petals, 2 tablespoons of fennel seeds

r5.name: Immunity Booster Juice
r5.ingredients: Coriander leaves, Mint leaves,Spinach, Apple, Cucumber, Lemon juice, Salt
r5.recipe: Add 1 Cup coriander leaves, 1 Cup Mint leaves, 1 Cup Spinach, 1 Apple, 1 Cup Cucumber, 1 tbsp Lemon juice, Salt, and grind it by adding some water
